name: Mystery Seekers: The Secret of the Haunted Mansion
name_original: Mystery Seekers: The Secret of the Haunted Mansion
description:
Mystery Seekers: The Secret of the Haunted Mansion is a game developed by Big Fish Games. It came out on 19-04-2012. Big Fish Games published the game.
You can play Mystery Seekers: The Secret of the Haunted Mansion on iOS.
